scripts.transpile: tsc && npm run transpile:bans && npm run transpile:basic && npm run transpile:tokens && npm run transpile:roles && npm run transpile:federation
scripts.pretranspile:federation: toa export manifest -p components/identity.federation -j $.entity.schema -o json > components/identity.federation/entity.json && json2ts -i components/identity.federation/entity.json -o components/identity.federation/source/types/entity.ts && rm components/identity.federation/entity.json && toa export manifest -p components/identity.federation -j $.extensions..schema -o json > components/identity.federation/configuration.json && json2ts -i components/identity.federation/configuration.json -o components/identity.federation/source/types/configuration.ts && rm components/identity.federation/configuration.json
